Title: Smithereens
Writer: Susan Seidelman (story), Ron Nyswaner (story), Ron Nyswaner (screenplay), Peter Askin (screenplay)
Actors: Susan Berman, Brad Rijn, Richard Hell, Nada Despotovich
Plot: A restless and abrasive young woman eschews the affections of a sensitive young portrait artist, preferring to chase punk singers in a misguided desire for fame and fortune in New York's Greenwich Village.
